quotes.quote: Memorable occasions should be brief, and so should be the expressions of appreciation.
You have to really be courageous about your instincts and your ideas. Otherwise you'll just knuckle under, and things that might have been memorable will be lost.
One cannot make a memorable catch without reaching out to catch the ball.
Some memories are unforgettable, remaining ever vivid and heartwarming!
People will walk in and walk out of your life, but the one whose footstep made a long lasting impression is the one you should never allow to walk out.
The most memorable people in your life will be the ones who loved you when you weren't very lovable.
If you want to live a memorable life, you have to be the kind of person who remembers to remember.
The brightest memory fades faster than the dullest ink.
Remember this although timing in life is everything, memorable moments in history don't just happen! Do something, stay positive!
The value of things is not the time they last, but the intensity with which they occur. That is why there are unforgettable moments and unique people!

Every memorable act in the history of the world is a triumph of enthusiasm. Nothing great was ever achieved without it because it gives any challenge or any occupation, no mater how frightening or difficult, a new meaning. Without enthusiasm you are doomed to a life of mediocrity but with it you can accomplish miracles.
Only powerfully conceived images have the ability to penetrate the memory, to stay there, in short to become unforgettable.
We wrapped our dreams in words and patterned the words so that they would live forever, unforgettable.
Greatness is a journey that begins with the impossible and turns in to the unforgettable.
The unimaginable always becomes the unforgettable.
What makes things memorable is that they are meaningful, significant, colorful.
It's important to be willing to make mistakes. The worst thing that can happen is you become memorable.
Originality is the key to being memorable.
What makes your brand stick and tick is your ability to make it memorable.
Being different and thinking different makes a person unforgettable. History does not remember the forgettable.
It's one of those unforgettable moments that happen as a child, when you discover that all along the world has been betraying you.
It is not so much consequence what you say, as how you say it. Memorable sentences are memorable, on account of some single irradiating word.
When the past is forgotten, the present is unforgettable.
Being memorable equals getting picked.
Be memorable. Say something unforgettable. Be silent
If you want to create a memorable company, you have to fill your company with memorable people.
The most memorable is always the current one. The rest just merge into a sea of blondes.
